articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Zambian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Zambian President
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Rupiah Bwezani Banda, Zambian President, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in the message wished the President and people of Zambia greater successes in their efforts for the socio-economic development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Zambia would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Botswanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Botswanian President 
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Seretse Khama Ian Khama upon his assumption of important post as President of Botswana.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Botswana would grow stronger in the future, the message wished the President success in his work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK will Consolidate Advantageous System for Ensuring Children Rights
articles.content:
DPRK will Consolidate Advantageous System for Ensuring Children Rights 
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will consolidate and develop the advantageous system for ensuring the children rights, considering the significant words of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that one should live not for today but for tomorrow as a cornerstone and firm guidelines for pursuing the policy for children. A delegate of the DPRK declared this in a speech made at the meeting of the Third Committee of the 64th session of the UN General Assembly on Oct. 16 when Item 65 "The Children Rights" was discussed.
					 He said: The Convention on Children Rights was adopted at the UN General Assembly 20 years ago, but practices of seriously violating the rights of children have not yet been eradicated on the earth.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently pursued the policy of attaching importance to the children, the future, under the slogan "Best things for the children!" regarding them as "kings" of the country from the very day of its founding.
					
					 The DPRK government and people have carried out the work to guarantee the children rights and promote their welfare under the national and social care despite the persistent moves of the United States and its followers to stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK government has provided a firmer legal guarantee for promoting the rights and welfare of the children and, at the same time, paid primary attention to the work for creating material and social conditions for substantially ensuring them, thereby giving steady play to the vitality of the universal system of free medical care and the compulsory free education system.

articles.title: Reception Given at Syrian Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given at Syrian Embassy
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Souheil Haidar, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here, gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday to mark the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Souheil Haidar said in his speech made at the reception that he felt grateful to the party and government of the DPRK for having expressed full support to the just struggle of the Syrian people. 
					
					 He referred to the fact that the Syrian people have positively supported the Korean people in their struggle to accomplish the cause of socialism and achieve the country's reunification.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop noted in his speech that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Hafez Al-Assad, the eternal leader of the Syrian people, have steadily grown strong under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and President Bashar Al-Assad.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK and the people of the DPRK will set store by the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation with Syria, expand and develop them in various fields and invariably and positively support and encourage the just cause of the Syrian people.

articles.title: 3rd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
3rd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China 
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition was held in Hunchun of China from Oct. 2 to 5 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On the display stand of the exhibition hall were potted Kimilsungias, flowers of the sun, and potted Kimjongilias, immortal flowers, in full bloom against the background of a large electric picture depicting Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu and a model of the Party Founding Memorial Tower. Seen on both sides of it were floral baskets from various organizations.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony of opening the exhibition.
					
					 Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, expressed conviction that the exhibition would help further deepen the friendship between the two countries and give confidence and courage to the Korean people devotedly working to open the gate to a thriving socialist nation at any cost in 2012 as intended by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Speakers said that Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia are flowers in praise of the great men which have come into full bloom with boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They stressed that the exhibition would mark a significant occasion conducive to boosting friendship and solidarity between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: New Medical Fiber Goods Developed
articles.content:
New Medical Fiber Goods Developed
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- New kinds of fiber goods for medical treatment have been developed and widely used in the DPRK.
					 Among them are an artificial blood vessel, an artificial cross-typed knee joint ligament, a knitted insulator for prosopalgia treatment and pressure bandage for joint researched by the Textile Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The artificial blood vessel is used to replace the blood vessel damaged by blood vessel diseases such as atherosclerosis obliterans and thromboangiitis.
					
					 It has features of flexibility, proper foraminiferal and three-dimensional porosity, which creates good conditions for the formation of the intima and adventitia of the vessel after operation.
					
					 The artificial cross-typed knee joint ligament, strong in intensity, promotes cell proliferation and shortens treatment and recovery time.
					
					 The knitted insulator for prosopalgia treatment is excellent in all indices of prosopalgia treatment and has a high remedial value.
					
					 The goods have neither toxicity nor side-effects and never decay in the body.
					
					 In the recent years they have proved efficacious in the treatment. Doctors of the cerebral nerve system told KCNA that they were one more innovation in the field. 
					
					 These goods made with domestic raw materials are highly appreciated by doctors of Kim Man Yu Hospital, Pyongyang University of Medicine Teaching Hospital and other hospitals and experts in the field of public health.

articles.title: Korean Revolution That Originated from DIU
articles.content:
Korean Revolution That Originated from DIU
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The prolonged history of the revolution is full of tremendous changes and creation the Korean people have made in the unremitting struggle for sovereignty, independence and socialism under the leadership of the great leader President Kim Il Sung.
					 He, who had taken the road of independent development of the revolution in his early years, formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) in October of Juche 15 (1926) to set the milestone of a radical turn in shaping the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 The Juche-oriented revolutionary cause which was pioneered by the DIU has vigorously advanced along the road of independence, Songun and unity for the past 80-odd years.
					
					 The President created the immortal Juche idea to blaze the road of the era and the revolution and thoroughly implemented the idea and principle of independence in the whole course of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the banner of independence held aloft by the President the Korean people have been able to create the glorious history of the national liberation and prosperity with their own efforts, meeting all the challenges in history and firmly adhering to the Juche-oriented revolutionary method.
					
					 Having declared confrontation with the imperialists through the formation of the DIU, the President had consistently held fast to the idea and line of giving importance to arms from the early period of the Juche-oriented revolution and ensured the victory of the general Korean revolution by dint of invincible military forces.
					
					 He had built a prosperous and powerful socialist country by increasing the military strength of the revolution throughout his life. His Songun revolutionary leadership exploits gave birth to the great Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea and ushered in the grand Songun era.
					
					 The formation of the DIU marked a turning point in opening up the new era of the revolution in which young vanguards of the new generation advanced and emerged victorious with invincible might of the single-minded unity centering on the leader.
					
					 The glorious cause of the revolution pioneered by the President is being carried forward and developed on a new higher level in accordance with the pure lineage of the DIU under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He has pursued the Songun politics by creditably inheriting the Songun idea and line with their origin in the DIU, which constitutes the fundamental source for the Korean revolution to have won victories century after century.
					
					 Full of faith and optimism about certain victory, the Korean people will in the future, too, vigorously hasten the historical advance for bringing the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause to accomplishment which started from the formation of the DIU and for successfully realizing the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Inevitable Doom of Imperialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Inevitable Doom of Imperialism
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- It is definite and a matter of time for the doom of imperialism to become a reality. With no machination can the imperialists bring under control the situation in the world political arena which has already turned unfavorable to them.  
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are driven into an uncontrollable crisis at present and the fact that the popular masses are getting awakened in a revolutionary manner is a clear proof that the doom of imperialism is coming nearer. 
					
					 The contradictions and conflicts among the imperialist powers to dominate markets and expand the sphere of their influence are now festering and the imperialists are hard hit by the strong resistance of people in Asia, Africa and Latin America.
					
					 The balance of forces in the world is tipped more favorable to the side of the revolution and that of progress and independence while the anti-imperialist independent forces are decisively prevailing over the reactionary forces of imperialism. 
					
					 Even the working people in the capitalist countries are intensifying their struggle for democratic freedom and right to existence, greatly inspired by the present trend of the times in which the desire of progressive mankind for independence is growing exceptionally stronger and the world is heading for it. 
					
					 Socialist Korea emerging victorious and displaying its might thanks to Songun serves as a beacon of hope and banner of victory for the world people aspiring after independence, the article notes, stressing that the invincible Songun politics is injecting strength and courage into the progressive people and precipitating the downfall of imperialism.

articles.title: Will to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations Reiterated
articles.content:
Will to Implement Inter-Korean Declarations Reiterated
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Oct. 21 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of its formation.
					 The statement noted that after its formation, the solidarity has waged the vigorous struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration on the basis of the spirit of "By our nation itself".
					
					 It recalled that the organization waged the anti-U.S. movement in diverse forms and ways and especially made a great contribution to popularizing the struggle for pullout of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 The organization has also dynamically conducted the struggle for democratization in solidarity with the people, the statement said, contending that no force can reverse this proud history of the organization.
					
					 The solidarity will as ever vigorously turn out in the struggle for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to make practical contribution to the realization of national reunification, the desire of all Koreans, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Korean Films Screened in Germany
articles.content:
Korean Films Screened in Germany
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Korean film "A Schoolgirl's Diary" was screened on Oct. 16 as a special program of the 2nd Asian Women's Film Festival 2009 in Berlin.
					 Its spectators unanimously expressed admiration at the development of the Korean cinematic art, saying that the plot of the film is very wonderful and they felt the unique artistry that can be hardly experienced in Europe and the warm tender-heartedness of the Korean people.
					
					 Meanwhile, Korean films "The Flower Girl", "A Broad Bellflower", "Hong Kil Dong" and "The Tale of Chun Hyang" were shown during the festival.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Marked
 Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- A reading session and a photo exhibition were held by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement, a book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Bulgaria and a fine art exhibition in Italy from Oct. 3 to 15 to mark the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great persons, books and photos on the true looks of Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					The executive secretary of the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement highly praised the great ideological and theoretical exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in building the revolutionary party of Juche type before reading out his work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The mayor of Montana of Bulgaria said that the exhibition would be greatly conducive to promoting the friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and Bulgaria and strengthening their contact in the field of culture. And he hoped that the Korean people would achieve prosperity along the road chosen by them in the future, too.
					
					 The mayor of Santa Croce of the Region of Piemonte of Italy and the chairman of the Italy-DPRK Cultural Association noted that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has led to victory the Korean people's drive for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige nuevas granjas porcinas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige nuevas granjas porcinas
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Granja de Cerdos Reproductores 26 de Septiembre y la Granja de Cerdos 22 de Octubre, nuevamente construidas.
					El Dirigente estuvo primero en la primera granja.
					
					Mientras recorria el exterior y el interior de la granja, averiguo en detalles el estado de construccion y operacion y aprecio mucho los orgullosos meritos de los constructores militares mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan construido magnificamente esa moderna granja en el corto tiempo de un ano.
					
					Luego de escrutar las caracteristicas y metodos de cria de los cerdos reproductores de varias razas en la sala de mando general y en los edificios de cria, reconocio los esfuerzos de los empleados de la granja contentandose de que ellos esten enviando  muchos lechones de buena variedad y alta productividad a las granjas porcinas a base de la cientifica cria y el cuidado de los cerdos mediante una amplia campana de innovacion tecnologica.
					
					Seguidamente, presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la administracion de la granja.
					
					Lo mas importante para aumentar la produccion de la carne de puerco es criar los cerdos de buenas variedades que se adapten al clima de nuestro pais y crezcan rapidamente consumiendo poco pienso, senalo.
					
					Prosiguio que para resolver con exito ese problema, hay que prestar primordial atencion a la materializacion de la orientacion del PTC de producir una innovacion en la busqueda y la utilizacion de buenas variedades.
					
					Destaco que comenzaron ahora a aportar grandes beneficios numerosas bases ganaderas modernas, construidas por doquier en los ultimos anos, incluyendo las plantas avicolas, las granjas de patos y de cerdos donde se establecio un cientifico sistema de cria.
					
					Indico que tal exito muestra claramente que si se apoyan en las ventajas del sistema socialista al estilo coreano y se emplean plenamente el temperamento revolucionario y los talentos creadores de los coreanos, se pueden registrar en un corto tiempo los cambios seculares tambien en la ganaderia.
					
					Subrayando que la construccion de esta moderna granja de cerdos reproductores dio amplias posibilidades de aumentar trascendentalmente la produccion de la carne de puerco, encomendo a todos los sectores y unidades que libren en gran medida la cria de ese ganado.
					
					Acto seguido, se dirigio a la Granja de Cerdos 22 de Octubre.
					
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones frente al plano de la granja, recorrio por varias horas el exterior y el interior de la granja cerciorandose en detalles del estado de construccion y equipos tecnicos, de cria y elaboracion de la carne.
					
					Aprecio mucho los meritos de los militares y otros constructores mostrandose satisfechisimo de que ellos hayan construido magnificamente en un corto periodo esa moderna granja con gran cantidad de produccion.
					
					El Dirigente dijo que esta granja construida en el maximo nivel cualitativo es la perfecta donde se vieron realizadas magnificamente la cientifizacion y la intensificacion de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo, y se mostro muy satisfecho de poder legar a las generaciones venideras otra riqueza de eterna duracion que contribuira a aumentar la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Muy contento de que la planta haya aumentado rapidamente la produccion de la carne porcina mediante la fundamentacion cientifica de la cria y el cuidado y este produciendo en gran cantidad los articulos elaborados con la carne de puerco y sus derivados poniendo en funcion modernos equipos de procesamiento, subrayo que ella es la ejemplar, donde estan materializados el caracter popular y el principio de rentabilidad, porque se produce mucha cantidad de carne y los articulos elaborados en un area reducida y poca mano de obra.
					
					Es muy loable que la granja contribuyera mucho a la produccion de cereales normalizando la operacion de una moderna fabrica de fertilizante compuesto organico con los excrementos de ganados, destaco. 
					
					Las bases de produccion preparadas a costa de tantos esfuerzos nuestros contribuyen ahora realmente al desarrollo economico y a la mejora de la vida del pueblo mostrando sus brios inapagables, dijo. 
					
					Agrego que este orgulloso cambio evidencia la justeza y la vitalidad de la estrategia economica de nuestro partido que ha venido sentando poco a poco y sustancialmente la base de produccion como si subiera por una escalera peldano por peldano. 
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para la gestion de la planta. 
					
					Para suministrar a nuestro pueblo mayor cantidad de varios articulos de carne procesados muy sabrosos y nutritivos, hay que poner en pleno funcionamiento las existentes instalaciones de elaboracion y agregar los procesos de elaboracion de la carne en polvo y la conserva, indico y enseno los remedios concretos para el respecto. 
					
					  Ahora nuestra industria autoctona y poderosa, que nuestro pueblo ha consolidado superando las pruebas de toda indole, comienza a hacer alarde de su gigantesca potencialidad productiva, apunto.
					
					Gracias a ello, en nuestra patria se registran grandes innovaciones y saltos nunca vistos en la historia y se hace realidad nuestro ideal largamente acariciado, dijo y llamo encarecidamente a redoblar los esfuerzos, cada vez que se nos acerque el dia de la victoria, por traer cuanto antes el maravilloso futuro de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en esas visitas por Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea.

articles.title: RPDC seguira consolidando sistema para derechos infantiles
articles.content:
RPDC seguira consolidando sistema para derechos infantiles
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ATCC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desarrollara aun mas su ventajoso regimen de aseguramiento de derechos infantiles tomando como piedra angular y firme guia de la politica infantil la significativa ensenanza del Dirigente Kim Jong Il: vivir no para hoy, sino para manana.
					  Asi destaco el delegado coreano al hacer uso de la palabra el dia 16 durante los debates de la agenda No. 65 "Derechos infantiles" en la reunion del tercer comite del 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					  Aunque hace ahora 20 anos fue aprobado el Convenio sobre Derechos Infantiles en la Asamblea General de la ONU, no se han erradicado todavia en el globo terraqueo los casos de violacion brutal de los derechos de los ninos, lamento el y prosiguio:
					
					  Desde los primeros dias de su fundacion, la RPDC presenta a los ninos como "reyes" del pais y mantiene invariablemente la politica de dar importancia al futuro, a los infantes, bajo la consigna "!Lo mejor a los ninos!"
					
					  Pese a las obstinadas maniobras de aplastamiento de EE.UU. y sus satelites, el gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC laborean bajo la atencion estatal y social para asegurar los derechos de los ninos y fomentar el bienestar de ellos.
					
					  El gobierno de la RPDC consolida mas la garantia legal para mejorar los derechos y el bienestar de los infantes y, al mismo tiempo, presta primordial atencion a la preparacion de las condiciones materiales y sociales necesarias para ponerla en practica, de manera que sigan vigentes sin interrupcion el sistema de asistencia medica gratuita general y el de educacion obligatoria gratuita.

articles.title: Montada en China 3a exhibicion de kimilsungias y kimjongilias
articles.content:
Montada en China 3a exhibicion de kimilsungias y kimjongilias
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvo lugar del dia 2 al 5 la tercera exhibicion de kimilsungias y kimjongilias en Hunchun, China.
					Sobre el mostrador estaban colocados un luminico electrico de gran tamano, que mostraba el lago Chon del monte Paektu, y la maqueta del Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido.
					
					Delante de ellos, se veian las hermosas kimilsungias, flor del Sol, y kimjongilias, flor inmortal, que estaban flanqueadas por los cestos florales enviados por varias entidades.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural hubo discursos.
					
					Yang Hongzhun, director general del Invernadero de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia en Hunchun, expreso su conviccion de que el certamen servira para ensanchar la amistad entre ambos paises e infundir la fe y el coraje en el pueblo coreano que trabaja abnegadamente para abrir a toda costa las puertas a la gran potencia prospera socialista en el ano 2012 segun el proposito del Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que las kimilsungias y kimjongilias devienen las flores de alabanza a los grandes hombres que nacieron nutriendose de la ilimitada veneracion al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Aseguraron que la exhibicion sera una ocasion significativa para contribuir al robustecimiento de la amistad y solidaridad entre los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Celebrados en varios paises actos por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Celebrados en varios paises actos por efemerides coreanas
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del 83o aniversario de la constitucion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo, tuvieron lugar del dia 3 al 15 el cenaculo de lectura y la exposicion de fotos en el Secretariado del Movimiento Panafricano, la exposicion de libros, fotos, bordados y productos de artes menores en Bulgaria y la galeria en Italia.
					  En las ocasiones fueron exhibidos las obras del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los libros y fotos que dan a conocer el verdadero aspecto de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion miliar) y las obras de bellas artes que demuestran la inteligencia y los talentos del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Los participantes escucharon las intervenciones.
					
					  Antes de dar lectura a la obra del Dirigente      Kim Jong Il "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el partido del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung", el secretario ejecutivo del Secretariado del Movimiento Panafricano vertio loas a las enormes hazanas ideo-teoricas realizadas por el Dirigente para el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de un partido revolucionario del tipo jucheano.
					
					  El alcalde de Montana de Bulgaria dijo que la exposicion coreana contribuira grandemente a fomentar la amistad entre los pueblos de los dos paises y a fortalecer las relaciones bilaterales en la rama cultural y deseo que el pueblo coreano logre en lo adelante tambien la prosperidad siguiendo el camino optado por si mismo.
					
					  El alcalde de Santa Croce de la region de Piemonte de Italia y el presidente de la Asociacion de Cultura Italia-Corea se refirieron a que bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el PTC conduce a la victoria la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista.
